name: Force (BluR)
description:
Developed for Bar Sk #beersk Game Jam.

Force aims to provide fun, fast-paced experience for all. First player to 7 points win.

A/K - Used for evading incoming attacks or counter attacking.

S/L - Can be charged to deliver a heavy targeted attack. The longer you charge the faster/stronger your attack delivers.

Boxing rules apply for scoring ^_^.

Enjoy!!
